sage.scene.state

Class BlendStateRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.state.RenderStateRecord
      • sage.scene.state.BlendStateRecord

  • public class BlendStateRecord
extends RenderStateRecord
    * BlendStateRecord holds a record of the current BlendState values stored in a RenderContext. Each BlendStateRecord holds data describing a blend state, including the src RGB factor, alpha, and destination RGB factor and alpha. This class also maintains values representing the selected blend equation, reference alpha, and blend color representing the resulting color of the blending process. This class is heavily based off of the BlendStateRecord class found in JME2
    Author:
    Jon Tinney
